column1: When this matter was mentioned on 9th October 2019, the learned Counsel for

the  Petitioner 
informed  this  Court  that  as  the  2nd  Respondent  was  now
functioning  with  elected  members,  he  would  be  satisfied  if  the  imposition  of

rates  as  evidenced  by  ‘P8’ 
is  approved  by  the  newly  elected  Council.  The
learned  Counsel  for  the  1st  and  2nd  Respondents  thereafter  brought  to  the
attention of this Court, the following matters6:
